SELECT A.id , A.title , A.content , A.depth , A.location , CONCAT(B.original_name, type) AS oriFileName , CONCAT(B.name, type) AS fileName FROM ( SELECT * FROM intro WHERE 1 = 1 AND organization_code = #{orgCode} AND is_delete = 0 ) A LEFT JOIN file B ON B.id = A.file_id
ORDER BY A.depth ASC

SELECT intro.id , intro.title , intro.content , intro.location , intro.file_id , CONCAT(f.original_name, f.`type`) AS ori_thumbnail_img , CONCAT(f.name, f.`type`) AS thumbnail_img , intro.create_user FROM intro JOIN file f ON f.id = intro.file_id WHERE intro.id = #{introId}
